description: This solicitation amendment is Raised to Extend the solicitation closing date from 2024-06-18 to 2024-07-03, and to Provide clarification and answers to a question from potential suppliers.

full_summary:
================================

### School Bus Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** cb-329-40258428

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-06

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-03T14:00:00

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246846/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire five (5) school buses for delivery to various locations across Canada. The delivery date is expected to be 270 days after receipt of order (ARO). The required equipment has been identified as 25101500 under the NSPS Classification System.

This tender is subject to the Canadian Content Policy. Bidders must submit their proposals in English or French.

### Requirements and Deliverables

* Five (5) school buses
* Delivery to Cold Lake (AB), Shilo (MB), Petawawa (ON), and Gagetown (NB)
* Delivery date: 270 days after receipt of order (ARO)

### Tender Status

* Tender status: Expiré (Expired)
* Amendment Number: 3

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be found on the Canada Buys website. 

A delivery of the School Bus Requirements will be sent electronically, ONLY with the Email address below:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

### Contact Information

* Name: Dong Le
* Email: dong.le@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (999) 999-9999
```
